projects.title: Minotaur's Maze
projects.description: Game in first person in which you need to fight the minotaur and find the exit of the maze.

projects.title: This Portfolio Website
projects.description: Website that highlights my experience and personal projects.

projects.title: LEGO Farm
projects.description: Relaxing game for the LEGO Ideas Game Jam. Grow different types of crops and harvest them to earn money.

projects.title: Asteroids
projects.description: First game I made to practice my new acquired skills in Unity.

projects.title: Ludum Dare 44: Loose Change
projects.description: Game made in group with some folks from the Baltimore Indie Game Developers Group.

strings.Intro: I like to keep improving and learning new skills. I look for skills that are fun, useful and complementary to my job as a front-end software engineer. This is a list of projects that I have created in the last years during my free time to practice those skills.
